properties.name: profanity.custom-words
properties.description: A comma-separated list of custom words to be considered profane.

properties.name: session-code.seed
properties.description: The seed value used for encoding and decoding session codes.

properties.name: session-code.length
properties.description: The length of the generated session codes.

properties.name: session-code.dictionary
properties.description: The dictionary of characters used for generating session codes.

properties.name: pictures-s3.host
properties.description: The host URL of the S3-compatible storage service for pictures.

properties.name: pictures-s3.port
properties.description: The port number of the S3-compatible storage service for pictures.

properties.name: pictures-s3.public-endpoint
properties.description: The public endpoint URL for accessing pictures stored in the S3-compatible storage service.

properties.name: pictures-s3.bucket-name
properties.description: The name of the S3 bucket where pictures are stored.

properties.name: pictures-s3.access-key-id
properties.description: The access key ID for authenticating with the S3-compatible storage service.

properties.name: pictures-s3.secret-access-key
properties.description: The secret access key for authenticating with the S3-compatible storage service.
